definition: the act of creating written works
details:
noun
- the act of creating written works
= synonyms: authorship
- musical creation
= synonyms: composing
- something that is created by arranging several things to form a unified whole
= example: something that is created by arranging several things to form a unified whole
- the way in which someone or something is composed
= synonyms: constitution
- the spatial property resulting from the arrangement of parts in relation to each other and to the whole
= example: the spatial property resulting from the arrangement of parts in relation to each other and to the whole
= synonyms: composing
- an essay, especially one written as an assignment
= example: an essay, especially one written as an assignment
= synonyms: paper, theme, report
- art and technique of printing with movable type
= synonyms: typography
- a musical work that has been created
= example: a musical work that has been created
= synonyms: piece
- a mixture of ingredients
